alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clarke; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 8:04PM CST until February 03 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Alabama... Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam affecting Clarke, Choctaw and Washington Counties. For the Tombigbee River...including Coffeeville Dam, Leroy...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, pastureland becomes flooded. Livestock should be moved to higher ground. Old Ferry Road near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 27.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Wednesday morning to a crest of 29.6 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. &&
